1.content:
Like any other afternoon, you're walking home from school. Up until now, you had a perfectly normal day- so normal, you can't even recall what had happened. It probably wasn't anything important anyways. However, once you come around the corner, you're a little surprised. Usually, that's the moment when you cross your fingers and hope your parents' car isn't sitting in the driveway , so you can have a few hours of alone time. However, instead, there was a big white truck parked there instead. Four men were standing around a large package on the sidewalk, apparently waiting for someone to come home and claim it.
"What's in the box?"

One of the men reaches into the passenger's seat of the truck and pulls out a large manila envelope. The kind that important letters and photographs usually came in to prevent bending.

"That should explain everything," the man said, trying to resist smiling. He seemed awfully excited for a delivery man. "Where would you like us to set it up? We'll be out of here in a jiffy."

"Huh? Set it up?"

"Most people like to put it in the basement, but if you have room in the shed, that's fine too."

"Uhm... Alright, I guess."

The men lift the the nine-foot box with relative ease, and move into the shed and get to work. You open up the envelope and take a look at the letter inside.


"Dear Kyle,
After months of careful observation, we have concluded that you're the perfect participant for testing the latest version of our brand new product- the Mind Transfer Device. This machine is specially designed to extract the memories and consciousness of two people- "The Souls," and redistribute them into each others bodies. This phenomenon is called body switching, or "Body Swap." Use the machine at your own discretion in whichever way you see fit. Enclosed is a manual on advanced usage and care for the machine.

We only ask three things of you while using the Mind Transfer Device:
(1) Use the machine responsibly. It is ill-advised that you attempt to swindle unknowing participants or decide to take permanent residence in your new body. While we will not prevent you from doing so, you should keep in mind that you are a beta tester. Glitches might materialize as lethal side-effects.
(2) Keep both the machine and your participation in this project as secret as possible. Only those who test the machine alongside you should be informed of its function and existence, and you should only test it with people who can be trusted. This will be enforced. Recklessness will be punished with repossession of the machine, and more, depending on the severity of the information leaks.
(3) NEVER attempt to disassemble the machine yourself. Should repair be required, our specialist's number is included in the manual. You are only borrowing this product, we still own it, and if you intentionally destroy our property, we will use all of the power at our disposal to make you suffer.

We will be watching.
Sincerely,
Ye Olde Body Shoppe"

"Ooooookay... Weird." you say.When you look up from the letter, the machine has been set up in the shed, and the workers are already gone. They sure did do that in a jiffy! You take the manual out of the envelope, and go inside to take a look at it. You read over the entire thing, and finally decide that this is really happening, or someone had a lot of spare time to set up this whole situation, and write out a convincing manual just for a prank. You decide, prank or not, this is simply too good to pass up. You need to take it for a test run- but who should go first?
1.title: A Machine Built for Chaos

You swallow hard, and proceed inside of the building you thought you were done with for good. Surely, that baby wasn't coming today. You were inside Ms. Flanny's body for an entire night. Though you might not be familiar with what a woman's body feels like as it proceeds through all of the stages of pregnancy, to you, it didn't feel like you were about to have a baby.

This day proves to be terrible on all fronts. Not only are you in a state of constant regret for deciding to go to school, you forgot to bring Johanna's bag. You have none of her books, notebooks, homework,, gym clothes, or writing utensils. In every class, you're made to feel like a delinquent. Your sister's friends try and talk to you, but you just have no clue how to respond. All day, you're lost in the building, never sure where to go next or what was going on. When the final bell finally rang on one of the worst days of your life, you feel relief like never before. Unfortunately, your house is one of the very last stops on the bus route, and it's another 45 minutes before you finally get back to your house.

Your parents aren't home, and when you peek inside the shed, everything is as you left it. Your body is probably inside of the house. This is your chance to use Johanna's body to ambush yours. You're worried about your sister, but if the man sees you going over to the neighboring yard, you'll definitely lose the element of surprise.
11521222221.title: A Day in Middle School

115212222211.content:
You open the door to your own home, with more caution than ever before, and are greeted by the sound of laughter. One of the voices is definitely your own. Careful not to make your presence known, you approach the living room, where a thick layer of smoke is flowing out from. Your heart sinks.

You see your body, with a blunt in hand, laughing and wrapping his arm around some girl. You thought you recognized her from school, but she's not someone you have ever typically hung out with. If your girlfriend saw this, she'd flip her lid- or so you thought, until you looked at the other people in the room. Your girlfriend, and your best friend Ryan were also present and had clearly been smoking marijuana too. One other guy you didn't recognize at all was there, and there was also some goth-looking girl. It was a strange bunch, but they looked like they were having a lot of fun. You don't smoke pot, or do drugs of any kind, and you thought your friends were clean too, but apparently that was no longer true. Even if you do get your body back, the thief may have already changed more than you expected him to. What if your friends don't like you as much as they liked him?

You remain outside of the room, unsure of what to do with yourself. If you barged in, and could somehow prove yourself to your friends, your combined might would definitely be enough to force him outside and into the machine. But what if they don't believe you? What if he did something to the machine? Your heart throbs so fast, that it hurts. You don't know what to do.
115212222211.title: Confronting the Demon

1152122222112.content:
As quietly as you entered, you exit into the back yard, and slip inside of the shed. You curl yourself into a ball and lean against the wall. The image of your friends, and even more people, all enjoying the company of that man stuck with you. He was better than you in every way. That much was obvious. Was it even worth it to go back to your body when everyone else likes it better with him? You might never amount to much, but he would be successful. Maybe you should just go get Johanna, and give her body back right now. You could just leave your body behind, and suck up childbirth. Maybe once you had the baby, your motherly instincts would kick in and you could be satisfied with that life.

Just as you stand to go fetch your sister, the door to the shed opens and your heart stops. You expect to see your own face, but it's not. Instead, that gothic girl from your living room entered, staring directly at you, as if she knew exactly where you were standing before she had even opened the door. Her heavily shadowed eyes meet yours, and do not brake contact, until she closes them and bellows a melancholy laugh. "You are a boy, stuck in the body of a girl. I would honestly expect you to be more preoccupied with the sexual connotations of that than getting your skin back." You yelp in horror. Did he switch with this girl? Why? Why would he take a female body again? The girl shakes her head at you, and then looks at the body switching machine. "So, this is the machine. Very interesting."

This girl is creepy.
1152122222112.title: Retreat

11521222221121.content:
You remain in the shed with the girl, and she nods at you, as if in appreciation. "Since I know all of your secrets, perhaps I should let you in on mine, yes?"

The girl opens one of the doors to the machine, and sits down, crossing her legs and sitting in a relaxed position. "My name is Rosa Bedford. I have the ability to read minds." You initially roll your eyes, but stop yourself. There's a machine that can transfer a person's brain in your shed. Nothing is unbelievable. "Very good," she says winking at you, instantly erasing any shadow of a doubt that she's telling the truth. You wonder why she has this ability, but you refrain from asking right now. Something tells you that she's not going to share that part of her story today. "You might not... Rather, you do not know me. I am in your school, but we have never spoken, verbally. I have seen your thoughts."

You blush a little. You really dislike the idea of someone poking around in your head. You aren't fond of people messing around inside of your body, either. "When that man in your body came to school today, I could tell immediately that it was not you. I know your story. I know his story. His brain told me about this... work of magic that I am sitting in, and I admit it, I became curious. I wanted to play with it myself. So I went ahead and pretended to be your friend. He had no way of knowing that was a lie. I hope you do not mind."

The way she phrased that she 'wanted to play with' the machine made you feel a little uneasy, but this girl, Rosa, didn't feel malicious. "First things first, however. That scumbag of a man in still inhabiting your body, and your sister could go into labor without warning. We can play later, but we need to fix this mess. I have only one question for you. Should we put him back into the pregnant woman's body, or make him suffer?"

Though almost witch-like in her ominousness, something about Rosa fills you with confidence. She's not at all concerned with how to get your body back. Only what to do afterwards. Though you've only just met her, and she could easily be manipulating your thoughts, you trust her.
11521222221121.title: Rosa Belford

choices: "A deal's a deal. Be my guest."
115212222211211.content:
"Very well. But if he tries to steal your body again, please do not whine to me about it." Rosa gets out of the pod, closes the door, and prepares to return to the house where your body is. "Go fetch your sister, and bring her back here. I will take care of your body."

---

You bring Johanna back to the shed, and are surprised to see your body already there, sweating and panting as if he were dying. He was kneeling down and apparently at your new friend's mercy. He couldn't run, escape or even fight a mind-reader. It was scary how powerless such a charismatic man was when faced with the supernatural. Ryan, your girl friend, and those other kids had left and gone home. You switch back into Ms. Flanny's body, putting Johanna back in hers. Next you finally switch back with your own body. Though you're relieved, suddenly being thrust into the effects of the drugs that he had been smoking knocked you unconscious and made you sick for a few days. When you woke up, your parents scolded you for experimenting with drugs, and you stayed home from school for a few days, trying to sleep off everything that had happened.

When you finally feel back up to snuff, you go outside, and you're surprised to see Ms. Flanny, or rather, the man in her body, on her front porch, breast feeding a baby. You think you see him shooting you a dirty look, but you ignore it, and go to the shed, where Rosa is waiting for you.

"I suppose you made the right decision," She says as you enter the shed. "The shock of using the machine so many times forced him into labor early. He is a mother now. A mother, who will not abandon her child. Though he clearly has lingering regrets, the connection between a parent and their child is an extremely powerful emotion." For the first time, Rosa smiles, "He has lost the will to return to a male body, and has accepted his situation. I doubt he will come after yours, or any body again."

You sigh in relief, now that that crisis is over, and it ended happily for all parties involved, somehow.

Rosa smiles again, to your surprise."Now that that problem is dealt with, I want a turn. "

You look once at Rosa, and then look towards the body switching machine. She wants to switch with you? You can't imagine why she would want that.
115212222211211.title: Return

1152122222112111.content:
"You really got me and my sister out of a bind. I suppose that's the least I can do to thank you."

You and Rosa both get into the pods of the machine, and activate it. For a moment, you wonder if you've been the victim of an elaborate ruse, but before you can follow up on that thought, the familiar blue flash transports you into the other pod, where you can tell your body has successfully swapped. You get out and stumble over to the mirror you had placed in the shed. You've been completely transformed into Rosa Belford. You have her face, covered in black makeup, and her black and light blue hair, which flows around your head. It smells great.

Her clothes are tight, though, like everything she has on is just a size too small. Her breasts are shoved into a tiny bra, and fingerless black gloves seem to cut off your circulation a bit. You're wearing a corset, which is something you never expected to wear in your lifetime. It forces your stomach in, as if you were sucking in your gut, but you can't exhale. Even your legs are covered in a pair of blue and black striped tights, which cover from your waist, all the way down to your toes underneath black sneakers. This wasn't usually what you imagined when thinking about girls, but you must have developed some kind of crush on Rosa in the short time you've known her, because the only thing you can think is, "Damn. I look hot!"

"Now that's the reaction I'd expect out of him. Good, I can still read minds."

You turn around and see your body standing, while Rosa similarly sizes it up. It takes a moment for it to sink in that when Rosa just spoke, you heard her regular voice, instead of your voice. When you realize this, jolts at you, with her mouth wide open. Her mouth doesn't move, but you still hear her speaking to you. "No way.. Have you gained a copy of my powers? Or has transferring my mind merely created a psychic link between us?"

Rosa takes out your cell phone, and checks the time. "It is almost time for school, you know. I think that would be a great way of putting our exchanged bodies to the test."

121.content:
Your mom reads the instruction manual. As she is doing so, you walk in. "Mom! What are you doing in here?!" you cry out, shocked to find that someone has found your secret. "I'm looking at this, and it seems that you've received a body switching machine! I never would have thought it was possible, but..." she trails off. You quickly try to repair the situation. "I swear, I wasn't planning on using it on you! I wouldn't ever think of--"
         "Well, maybe you should use it on me!" Your mom cuts you off abruptly. "It would do you good to have to do some honest work for once in your life!"

"Work?!" You say, incredulous. "All you have to do is keep half an eye on us! Other than that, you're free to do whatever you want!"

Your mom laughs. "Ha! I have the difficult life in this family! You just go to school, slap a few answers on a homework sheet, and laze around all day!"

Suddenly, an idea comes to you. "Maybe we should see whose life is harder! There's a feature on the machine that will let us keep the memories from the body we're in, to keep a more convincing act. We'll switch with each other, and live each other's lives for two weeks. At the end of that, maybe you'll realize your life is easier than mine."

"Oh, please, you'll be begging to switch back after the first day. But I'll do it. I need a break."

You each climb in a pod, and you set the machine so that it can't be used until after exactly two weeks. You then initiate the switch.

You feel dizzy, as if you're spinning around wildly fast, then after a couple seconds, the feeling stops. You look down to see your mother's light fabric v-neck shirt, knee-length black skirt, and high heels. Two mounds of flesh, your mother's breasts are now weighing down your stomach, and when you feel your crotch, only a small hole is there. You walk out, balancing on the high heels, and come face-to-face with your body.

"Let the bet begin," your mom says with your old voice. "You're on, mom. Good luck," you say, then you stop, unused to hearing your mother's voice when you speak. You walk up to her room, feeling her breasts lightly bounce, and getting used to the heels. You arrive in your parents' room and decide what to do.

"Sure."

It's at this point you start wondering what the hell you're thinking. But at the same time you feel an odd confidence in the choices that have led you this far.

Finally you've found a way to escape your dead-end job, or your husband who, frankly, you stopped loving a long time ago. Why not live a little? Or live a lot for that matter? This could ve a fresh start, to not make the same boring, safe choices you had always taken and instead live it up on the wild side!

Was having sex with her own son, tricking him into thinking you were his girlfriend a fucked up thing to do? Oh yeah, totally. But the rush of adrenaline you got from these things was your drive in life now.

Besides, Kyle was a nice boy, a perfect life partner. You should know, you raised him that way. And sure, maybe you didn't know everything about him, like his suddenly admitted attraction to fat chicks, but that only intrigued you more. What else did you not know about him as his mother that you could learn as his girlfriend?

More important to the situation you had just committed yourself to with a single word; What would being fat be like? You had always dieted and exercised carefully, but now you had a new chance to let loose. Maybe being an overeating party hog would be a blast?

You were feeling a little adventurous to say the least.

"Fuckin' sweet." Said Kyle, pumping his fist in the air. "Let's uhh... I dunno, go to McDonald's, that sound good?"

"Yeah, sounds great." A bit of a lie on your part. Even when you did indulge in McDonald's you had never really enjoyed it too much. But you had a feeling you were going to be getting real acquainted with the burger joint from here on out.

"Alright, nice, uhhh..." Kyle rummaged through his things to find his wallet. You had always found the way he stuttered and paused with his words to be cute, even when he was young. "Damn. Looks like I'll uhh... Have to ask my mom for some, uh, some cash."

Shit.

You had forgotten about her. While you were having the time of your life in Katie's body who knows what she had been up to in yours. She could ruin everything. You'd need to find a way to get rid of her, and fast, before your new life could really begin.

Plus there is your bank account to take into consideration. Kyle works odd Jobs while Joanna is supposed to have an allowance if she ever did her chores.”

“NO…” Kyle blurted out, “Mom I worked hard for that money and I’m saving up to buy Katie a ring.”

“Relax honey no one is spending your money but you. That reminds me. Joanna reach into your pocket and give Kyle’s wallet to her.” Seeing the still incomprehensive stares directed at her by her kids she added, “Look this fits in with the whole role reversal idea. While switched Joanna is to treat Kyle like the older sibling she is while she herself is treated like the younger sibling. Notice I left gender roles, I’m not too sure on how to handle that right now but I think treating both of you like a male should be okay unless you want to be treated like a girl Kyle?”

“Hi Mrs. Smith. What’s going on?” Katie asked as she looked around the room and spotted Joanna, “Wow Joanna you look really cute… I don’t think I’ve ever seen you in a skirt before. And I like what you did with your hair.”

“Joanna… Kyle right…” Katie mumbled before asking, “So you were going to ask me to go along with some sort of role reversal thing?”

"Well, I mean, I guess you..."I"...look okay," Katy says to you. She reaches over and pats your shoulder.

Fifteen minutes later, the bus pulls into the turnaround by the back door of Thanesville High. You both exit and walk through the doors to the junior lockers. Yours and Katy's are on opposite sides, but before you split off she pulls you aside.

"Hey, we've got a little under twenty minutes before classes start: do you want me to help you do your makeup? We can go to my locker...err, your locker...and I'll quickly help you put on some mascara. You know, to give you a bit of color.

The offer intrigues you. You look at the clock - it should be enough time. But you could also use the minutes before class to go to Katy's first class and get acquainted. After all, today you aren't starting your day with Literature and Language - Katy has Physics first. And you don't take Physics until next semester.

What do you do?

Kathy (or in fact , Joanna in Kathy's body) decides to let you think you switched with your girlfriend. After all , you told her former body to get lost , and with this machine and your body for the day , she could use a little revenge on her disrespectful brother.

So each of you continues with his own day and suddenly...
1332.title: Joanna's revenge

choices: Tell on your sister to your Mom
13321.content:
Strangely your body just walks away from you without much further discussion about swapping bodies for a day. When you think you are in the clear your dorky sister comes running toward you.

"Kyle, Kyle," she exclaimed.
"How did you know I was Kyle, twerp?"
"It's me Kathy."
"Well if you are in my sister's body, than that means... oh no, gross!"

"Look Kyle, I know that you can't be back in your body this second, but at least you can let me be back as myself."
"Eww, no way, am I becoming my sister."
"For me?"
Joanna's body batted her eyes. You felt sorry for her, because knowing that if she was in her body, a bat of her eyes could have you stopping at a store to buy her feminine products on gameday.

So you say you will agree, but that Kathy had to find and convince Joanna to switch back right away, so you would spend as little time as possible in Joanna's body.

The three of you head toward the machine. You make a comment to Kathy about how she stands walking with these things, referencing her breasts. She scoffs at the question in disgust and then smiles as though she realized something. She starts walking a little slower, but you attribute that to having your sister's short good-for-nothing-legs. Walking around as a pathetic twerp couldn't be easy either. You turn your head back at your body and your sister's body seeing them making eyes at each other.

"Wait so why can't I change back to my body first?" you ask.
Joanna in your body pushed you in the pod. Your sister's body (Kathy) sits in the other.

You start seeing lights and black out. When you wake up you feel tiny. You look up and see your body with your arms wrapped around Kathy.

"Come on sis, time to get out of my body"
"Oh that's not happening," you sister replies with your husky masc. voice.
"Kathy explains, "You sick SOB, you want to be a girl so bad, well now you are one. Who do you think you are trying to be me. Eww gross, like I'd ever want to be a guy. Your sister on the other hand. She doesn't have an issue with it. To be honest your sister is such a sweet person, and has no intentions of trying to manipulate me or lie to me. After we saw how bad you wanted to get into my body, we devised a plan. Enjoy being a girl, Kyle, or should I say Joanna? For the rest of your life! Sad thing is your sister will be twice the man you ever were. She'd stand up for me, and be a perfect gentleman, rather than some sly jerk. Come here Joanna, I mean Kyle and give your girlfriend a kiss."

Just then your body gave Kathy a passionate kiss. Had your sister always been some sort of lesbian, or transgender wanna be, or was it from being in your body and having your hormones running around her brain? The lesbo thing would have at least explained her bad taste in clothes.
13321.title: A Twist in Plans

choices: Find a stronger or better body to switch into.
133212.content:
Hearing that even your own girlfriend was in on it and wanted to be with your sister instead of you gave you an almost unbearable pain. You clenched your teeth in frustration and screamed "You can't just take my body, give it back!" You can't stand their sadistic grins anymore and dash towards your own body, arm retracted and ready to strike.

         You are about to release your arm when your sister steps forward a bit and grabs your small fist. You struggle to release from her grip but she has her entire hand around yours. Joanna then gives you a strong push on your chest, releasing her grip from your hand at the same time. You fall onto your butt, scrapping your arms and hands.

"A-hah! This body is pretty strong." Joanna says proudly, holding one arm up as if she was inspecting it. You look up in disgust, wiping your sister's long dull blonde hair out of your face. Kathy wraps her arms around Joanna's and rests her head on her shoulder. "Let's go already sweetie. You shouldn't pick on little girls." Kathy says smugly, trying to taunt you more.

"Alright." Joanna says while releasing her arm from Kathy's grasp and using it to pull her closer to her. They both begin to walk away only to turn their heads around with a smile and in harmony say "Bye Joanna." They turn their heads again and you see Joanna's hand drift lower and lower on Kathy's body, down to her perfect ass and you watch as she gives it a tight squeeze.

         You watch as they both walk away, down the sidewalk, most likely towards Kathy's place. The strong wind blows Kathy's long brown hair and almost send her long dark blue skirt flying upward. Everything about either of them drives you crazy and the name Joanna seems to echo in your head.

"What should I do...?" you ask yourself in your sister's annoying voice.
133212.title: Attack your body

choices: Full of pain you run out and yell at them.
Full of sorrow you run back home to think of a way to return things to normal.
1332121.content:
You decide to go after them as you are. Knowing full well that you can't force them back into the machine, you instead quietly stalk them just to know what they plan to do with your body. The continual image of Joanna groping your girlfriend is becoming a horrendous irritant to you.

Judging by the direction they are heading you are pretty sure they are going to Kathy's place. Your heart sinks at the thought of what they intend to do alone at Kathy's place. "I-I haven't even done that with Kathy yet, if Joanna does it with my body I'll throttle her with her own hands!" You whisper, an increasing intensity in your voice, almost enough to give yourself away.

The inability to hear their voices makes you wonder what they are talking about. Unfortunately, as they are about to enter Kathy's home, Joanna catches you by surprise and begins kissing Kathy. You struggle to keep from screaming and pray that Kathy will push Joanna away. It seems a devil granted your wish instead as Kathy begins to wrap her arms around your former body. Unable to watch anymore you look away and sit behind the neighbors fence.

You can't help but have your eyes water a little as you feel a dolorous memory imprint itself in your mind. "My girlfriend prefers my own sister and my sister turns out to be a lesbian manipulative bitch. Sadly, I was even stripped of my own body. This is not my day..." You sulk, a few tears streaming down your face.
1332121.title: Pursue them.

13321211.content:
You can't believe that you're actually crying as you wipe your face. That hasn't happened in years, but something about being in Joanna's body just has you all flustered and confused, feeling very different. Hearing Kathy giggling and your own voice laughing just makes you feel worse. Then the sadness turns to anger at what they've done to you, and you race around the fence and begin yelling.

"You two are just being mean. We could have fun with this, but you just want to hurt me. I, ... you, ... I ..."

It's so embarrassing to be crying, and now screaming like this seems stupid as well. You can't think of anything more to say, so you just turn and run away. You don't even stop when you hear Kathy call out, "Wait!" But you do hear your voice clearly.

"Let the little dork go cry with her dollies."

You run home and fly through the back door sniffling, tears dripping off your chin. After it slams, you hear someone call to you.
13321211.title: Full of pain you run out and yell at them.

Tell her about the machine so she'll help
133212111.content:
"You know better than to slam that door!" your mom calls from the kitchen. "Come in here and explain why you did that."

Why is Mom always in the kitchen? you think as you wipe the wetness from Joanna's face and trudge slowly to the back of the house trying to breath normally. It will probably be another lecture and punishment of doing chores like you always get from letting the door slam. They ought to have something besides a spring or put some padding so it doesn't sound so loud. It's not your fault.

"Oh, it's you Jo," she says surprised as she sees you. Then her expression changes. Her hands drop from her hips, and she crouches down to you. "What's with the red eyes? Why were you crying?" She holds out her arms and pulls you into a hug obviously forgetting about the slamming.

"It was Joanna and Kathy," you moan. "They ..."

"You mean Kyle and Kathy, dear?" she asks softly.

"No, I mean ..." Then you stop. She doesn't know about the machine, and she'll never believe you, er Joanna with her vivid imagination. What are you going to tell her?

She's my mom. She'll understand and believe me, right? ... Right!

OK. So what am I going to say or do that will help?

You draw a blank on lying. You've never been a good liar. Well, you're good at telling them, just not good at folks believing. Joanna's much better. At least you don't recall her getting caught. But if you pretend to be her and tell a phony story on yourself that Mom believes, then you will get into trouble. Not you as Joanna, but the real you that you want to be.

Your head starts to hurt thinking on this line so you decide against your poor judgment to tell the truth. Or rather to show the truth.

"I mean I need to show you."

You take her hand and pull her towards the back door to lead her to the machine.

"I've got the dishes and the baking to do, Jo. I can't just go wandering off and ..."

"P l e e e e a s e, Mommy?" you whine perfectly like Jonanna giving your best puppy dog sad eyes.

"Well, OK, dear. But we need to be quick"

Before she finishes, you've jerked her out the door. Your legs are spinning ferociously as you drag her along. When you get to the shed, ...

"Come on, Mom," you plead as she seems more like an anchor. She does look bigger to you now. Must be because you're your little sister.

You open the door and hear voices inside then the whir of the machine. You run over to look at the pods just as there is a brilliant flash of light blinding you.

The next thing you hear is a gasp by your mother and a thud. Just as your eyes readjust and the pods start to come into focus, ...
13321211121.title: Someone else is already there

133212111212.content:
A large, out-of-focus shape suddenly appears. Its tentacles latch onto your shoulders, then you're flung into one of the pods. Instinctively, you scream "MOM!" in Joanna's terrified voice. But, it's too late.

The doors close, and the panicked plea fades into total silence. Fear, anger, helplessness, and several other emotions activate Joanna's little girl hormones. Tears burst forth, and you begin pounding on the inside of the pod doors.

"Let me out! Let me out!. Please, let me out. I'm not who you think I am."

Then a voice very calm and deep seems to boom in your ears. At first you think someone is in the pod with you until you figure out that it must be a loudspeaker.

"For your safety, please step back from the doors and sit. In just a moment and the doors will open. Do not be alarmed when they do."

With defeat taking the lead, you drop hard onto the small cushioned stool. You push your head into your hands, elbows on knees, and try to stop the sinking feeling that things are about to get even worse.

There's another flash of light, but this time your eyes were closed, so you quickly look up. You feel quite different but don't have time to look at yourself because the doors part. There now standing before you is ...
133212111212.title: Someone grabs you and tosses you in a pod

choices: Kathy is still angry about your earlier comments.
1332121112121.content:
You can't believe it's your girlfriend Kathy standing there with a happy smile. Then again, you wonder if it really is. You don't have time to ponder this as Joanna's angry voice attacks your ears.

"You tricked me. You little bitch. You tricked me into this shitty little body."

"Young lady, watch your language. I'll not have you using such words,," your mom scolds and grabs Joanna by the ear.

"But she ...Ow!"

"You be quiet for a minute. What's going on here anyway?"

Well, it seems to you that Kathy took pity on you and got Joanna back to the machine just in time for you to show up and switch you back. Although, you can't explain that first flash.

"We're just playing a game with this toy Kyle got, Mrs. Lambert, and Joanna keeps butting in."

"I'm not butting in. She's trying to ... Ow!"

"I told you to be quiet, Miss. You need to find something else to do besides bother your brother and his girlfriend."

"But ...Ow!"

"You two have fun. I'll make sure Joanna doesn't interfere the rest of the day."

B-b-but ...OW!"

"Come along."

As your mom drags your sister off to the house, you turn to Kathy. "Thanks." You start to give her a hug, but she pushes you away.
1332121112121.title: Kathy, your girlfriend

choices: It's Customer Service asking how you're enjoying the machine.
13321211121212.content:
"Don't try to think you're going to get off that easy," she scolds you. "I hoped you learned something today."

"Yeah. I'm sorry," you offer. "Sticking me as that little girl twit, though, ..."

"That's it, jerk. Looks like you need another lesson," she chides and shoves you back into the pod.

The doors close, and your call of "Wait," is to late. However, Kathy just stands there with a mischievous grin.

I know that grin. You ponder a moment before it dawns on you."Joanna?" you ask in shock.

"That's right brother. I'm your hot girlfriend. Or should I say EX-girlfriend since there's no way I'm gonna make out with you."

Well, that explains the first flash, Joanna got Kathy to switch with her like Kathy wanted to do with you before your nasty comments about girls.

"I'm off to find a new boyfriend. Hope you miss me," she purrs the last making a sexy face and pose before giving you a sinister grin and sashaying off swinging her hips and leaving you trapped.

You are so angry you scream and pound the walls. You have to get out and save Kathy's body from your sister, but the pod is sealed tight. The sound goes nowhere because the pod's soundproof. Frustrated, you can't think how to escape, but suddenly you hear music playing. You look around until you realize it's coming from your pocket.

"Hello?"
13321211121212.title: Trapped.

choices: You run down the street to Ron's
133212111212122.content:
"Good Day, Kyle," a cheerful female voice greets you. "My name's Jan, and I'm with the Body Swap company calling to see how you are enjoying the machine you received."

As if everything else isn't enough of a problem, it's a call from the people who gave you this thing that's made such a mess of your life. Anger explodes against the poor soul on the other end of the line.

"I'M  TRAPPED  IN  THIS  STUPID  POD  AND  MY  SISTER  HAS  STOLEN  MY  GIRLFRIEND'S  BODY!"

"Yes, I can help with that," she relies calmly. "It's also available on page 13 of the manual under Releasing Pod Doors From Inside."

You stand there dumbfounded as Jan directs your gaze to a lever on the wall labeled "Door Release."

"All pods are equipped with safety procedures. The equipment has passed all health and environment safety codes to ensure that consumers are not accidentally," she pauses with a slight giggle before finishing. "consumed. Sorry, but that's the answer we always have to read."

Not really funny but in your stupid, panic-strickened state of mind finding such a simple solution has you involuntarily chortling in relief. You flip the lever, and the doors whoosh open. In a second you're outside.

"Thank you, and sorry about that yelling at first."

"Oh, I understand. I have a little brother that did something very similar when we were beta testing the device. In fact I've been swapped with just about any possibility you could imagine."

"Oh, wow. Really?"

"Yes. It was part of our training to ensure we can answer any and all problems."

"Oh, yeah. Well, thanks again. I gotta ..."

"Don't hang up yet."

"Huh?"

"Would you mind taking a short survey on how the machine and our support for you today?"

You roll your eyes and just barely keep from yelling. "Sorry, but I gotta go save my girlfriend's body from my little sister."

"Oh, yes. Annex Seven: Family members, page 4: Younger siblings in girl or boyfriend's body."

"There's a solution for that?"

"As I stated, the company was very thorough. Now, do you a close friend that your sister really annoyed and he probably teased her a lot?"

"Yes. Ron, my best pal since grade school."

"Has he ever shown interest in your girlfriend?"

"Of course, not. He's my best friend. We've all known each other for years. He'd never try to take her away."

"Suppose you broke up, or better, that he thought you broke up with her, and she was devastated. What would he do if she came crying to him like that?"

Although you want to say that he would try to get you two back together, you keep replaying in your head how many times he's told you how lucky you were to be with Kathy and that he wished he could have a girl as nice as her.

"OK. Got it. Thanks again."

"I'm glad I could help. And for your effort with using the machine, would you like to be entered into a drawing to meet the actual inventor?"

"Huh. I, ... um, ah, ... never, ..."

"No obligation. We have all your information. Just say yes."

"What the heck. Sure. I mean yes."

"OK then. Please feel to call anytime with a technical or personal problem with the machine. We're here to help. And always ... swap responsively."

"Yes, OK. Bye," you slowly say rolling your eyes.
133212111212122.title: Body Swap Machine Customer Service

choices: He pushes you into a pod.
1332121112121222.content:
Since Joanna has a good lead in front of you, the best thing is to call Ron and warn him. Warn him? How am I going to do that? The phone is starting to ring as you think what you can say.

There's also the sound of a familiar ring tone not far off, and you realize someone is coming. You peek around the side of the shed to see who.

"What's up, good buddy?" "What's up, good buddy?"

It's like an echo as you watch and hear Ron say into his phone almost at the same time as you hear him from yours.

"Oh great. You're here," you say into the phone as Ron watches you.

"Yeah. Isn't technology great how these things can relay our voices even while we stand next to each other?"

"Huh? Oh, yeah," you sheepishly acknowledge still talking into your phone. "Um ... goodbye," you add with an embarrassed laugh and hang up.

"So, again. What's up?"

You look all around for Joanna in Kathy's body while you pull Ron over to the body swapping machine. She's nowhere around so you relax with a sigh.

"Wow! Rad machine, Kyle. Where'd it come from?"

"Oh, got delivered earlier today," you explain proudly following him in front of the two pods.

"Some sort of teleporter or time machine?" he asks poking his head in one.

"No. No. Actually it's a body swapping machine."

He pops back out and looks you square in the eye. "Yeah, sure. Right."

"Seriously, it is," you counter now fully engaged in convincing him and ignoring the soft footsteps behind you.

"OK, so let's see a demonstration."
1332121112121222.title: You try to call Ron.

choices: Your mom calls you to the house.
13321211121212221.content:
Ron hops in the pod and stares at you.

"Dude, this isn't funny," you tell him as he chuckles.

"So it doesn't really work?"

"Yes, it does. I've already switched a couple times."

"Then how do I know it's really you?" he retorts with an accusing eye.

"It's me. Kyle. Your best friend since forever. Of course it's me."

"You could be anyone that Kyle may have given his body to." Suddenly he looks aghast and says, "Or maybe you stole Kyle's body and don't want to give it up?" He gets the panicked expression but can't hold it and bursts out laughing.

"Fine," you agree and go to the other pod.

As you watch the doors close, Ron grabs his head and starts screaming then puffing his checks as if he's about to explode.

Very funny, you think. Ron's always a great kidder.

You push the big button and there's a flash. The next thing you know is that you're holding your head and hearing the end of a scream.. The doors part, and you rush out turning to the other pod. In it you see your own body bewilderedly staring at you.

Just then ...
13321211121212221.title: You and Ron switch.

choices: Kathy (Joanna) has you take her home.
You convince her to go back with you.
133212111212122212.content:
"Look at that stupid nerd in a tube. The way he told me off and dumped me, he deserves to just fry in his stupid machine," Kathy (really Joanna) angrily blasts pointing at Ron who is now in your body.

You immediately realize that she doesn't know you switched. This could be my chance, you think. "Kathy, what happened?" you ask putting on a concerned air. "I thought you and Kyle were made for each other."

"I did, too," she sniffs forcing some fake tears to her eyes. "Until ... until ... Oh, Ron," she sobs throwing herself in your arms.

Ron gives you a confused look when you yell at him, "You jerk. How could you do this to your girlfriend ... your EXgirlfriend."

You hit the close button and seal him in then walk Kathy away. Hopefully, it will take him a while to get out and he won't do anything to give you away.

Right now, though, you have to figure out how to get Kathy and Joanna into the pods and switch them back. You can't just go to your house as Ron. You could call Joanna, if Ron has her number on his cell. You don't know what it is. Even if you do, you doubt your mom will let Joanna out, but maybe she could sneak out.

Alternatively, you could switch out and put Joanna in Ron's body, Then as Kathy, you could go get your sister from your mom. You're sure you could come up with an explanation. Of course, then you have to get your sister out of Ron's body.

Unfortunately, by now you and 'Kathy' have walked out of your yard and are headed down the street. Doing anything means that you have to get back to the machine.
133212111212122212.title: Joanna (as Kathy) shows up.

1332121112121222122.content:
"Kathy, this is ridiculous. Kyle doing this to you just gets me too upset," you begin your plan to get Joanna in Kathy's body back to the machine. "We need to go back and set him straight."

The look on her face is pure happiness at Ron's chivalry, and you think she's going to agree as she starts to speak.

"Oh. Ron. That's so sweet." She wipes the tears from her eyes and reaches up a hand to cup your cheek. "I'm glad you came by, but we don't have to do that," she coos coming closer and closer until her lips go against yours.

Between the surprise and your own emotional care for Kathy, you begin to return the kiss. Amazingly, Joanna's kiss, though different than Kathy's, does not turn you off. In fact, it is so good that you forget its your sister until it's too late and you're both passionately making out.

When you finally break, her eyes are beaming with joy and caring, and her mouth is curled in the cutest smile. They're so enticing that you almost miss her words as she takes your hand and starts to pull you along.

"Let's go to my house," she purrs. "We can deal with Kyle later. He's not going anywhere."

You've taken three steps before your brain (or is it Ron's brain you have? Probably, so it must just be your mind), your mind screams at you reminding you that it's your sister trying to seduce your best friend using your girlfriends body.

"No. Wait. I ... I can't," you manage to say while thinking of an excuse.

"Why not, Ron? It's you and me now. Kyle is history."

"B-b-but ... but he's not. That's the problem," you explain while a plan forms in your head (or is it Ron's head? ...) "I need to confront him first that, um ..., ah ..."

"That we're a couple?" she sighs lovingly.

Damn! You wish she didn't look like that. It's so hard to ignore her because you are so fond of Kathy. But you brace your thoughts (you know they're yours, you think. Maybe Ron would think like this.)

15121111112221.content:
Every night you spend in the body of your baby brother, Marky, you have nightmares about losing yourself and being consumed by your new persona as a baby, as you imagined your brother had become a dog and your dog had become you. At times, you actually wish you would lose yourself so you wouldn't be forced to live with the guilt.

That's not how things worked out.

As time passed over the next year, you noticed that your dog and brother had not simply been absorbed into their new psyches. The whole family realized Shep's personality had changed completely. While a bit of doggy instinct had clearly kicked in, most of his training seemed to have vanished, and he went through a period of using the bathroom inside the house and tearing up furniture. He was behaving like a puppy again.

Kyle, as you had grown accustomed to referring to your former body as, likewise seemed to run into a little trouble. He seemed to inherit some human knowledge from you, but he lost a lot of the skills you'd refined over the years. He was horrible at math, play instruments or socialize quite the way a well adjusted teen could. He did excel at sports though, where you never had. Most surprisingly, he had really excelled in English. The language really took to him for some reason. Reading emotions and empathy also came strongly to him. He'd been doing a lot of reading and writing, and he was actually really good at it.

You weren't sure if he remembered his time as a dog, he definitely wasn't talking about it, but you think he might have missed it, deep down. Shep, or Kyle, had become ingrained in 'furry culture,' declaring his fursona was that of a dog. Everyone accepted the drastic changes in personality given that he was a teenager. These types of changes were only natural.

Maybe it was because of your intense fear of being consumed, you had held on to your grown up mind as you grew. You never lost your intelligence or any of your memories, though your body wasn't always ready to keep up with them. Even so, you managed to potty train yourself soon after taking over Marky's body. You learned how to speak, well ahead of schedule for a kid (though, you downplayed just how eloquent you could be, just a bit) and quickly re-trained yourself how to speak. You were poised to be considered a genius among toddlers.

Honestly, this life wasn't too bad after all. You had managed to hang on to your fundamental identity while still enjoying the benefits of being a baby. The best of both worlds.

One day, while getting yourself a cup of milk out of the fridge, you realize you have the motor skills, and maybe the height needed to operate the machine in the shed. You instantly jump for joy, and slip outside through the doggy door, into the shed and discover you can indeed operate it now.

151211111122211.content:
Even as a super smart toddler, it's still tricky to coordinate switching everyone back into their correct bodies. The dog doesn't listen to you, so you need to lure him into the pod using treats. It takes several days, as Marky just eats the treats and runs away. As a fully grown human you could just force a dog in, but you have no strength to do so.

A few days later, when Shep is playing with Marky in the back yard, you manage to trick them both into coming into the shed by pretending to fall and get hurt. You sit near the pod, so when Shep comes to check on you, he's pretty much in. As he scans over you to make sure you're ok, Marky pops two legs into the other pod and begins to sniff around.

"Good enough!" you say, as you bash the activation button, and slide out of the pod. You hope this works with the doors open like they are.

When the machine stops, your body drops to the floor and looks around in surprise. From the other pod, Shep pops out, and seriously struggles to walk around on four legs. He walks around himself in circles as he tries to figure out what has happened. Finally he stops and looks directly at you, letting out the biggest whine you've ever heard. If dogs could cry.

Marky, occupying your body, is still half in the pod, which seems to be fine, so you just work your way over to the other pod and begin to climb in. As you're pulling yourself up, something grabs your shirt from behind, and you find yourself being yanked backwards.It's Shep, he's dragging you all the way out of the shed and into the yard! Once you're far back, he lets you go and sprints back towards the shed!

You pull yourself to your feet and try to run, but your body protests, and you fall face-down on the grass. You see shep make it in the door to the shed, and you hear the door to the house open behind you.
151211111122211.title: Time to switch back

choices: The machine activates again before you can get out!
1512111111222111.content:
Your dad is closing in quick to pick you up, and probably bring you back inside, locking you away from the machine for a while. You're worried what the baby and the dog might do to the machine if you don't get back there, so you push yourself back up again, praying your muscles will work with you this time.

As your dad reaches to grab you, you make it to your feet and flash a huge smile at him. You let out a giggle, and yell, "I'M GOOD!" feigning a bit of pride in the fact you were able to get yourself back up. Your dad still grabs you and lifts you up, bringing you in for a hug.

"My little boy is so amazing! No other kids can do the things you can! But you still need to be careful buddy!" He sets you back down on the grass, to your relief, and he shouts, "Kyle! Make sure you're keeping an eye on your brother!"

There's no response, but your dad still returns to the house to watch football. When he is inside, you once again make your way into the shed. Your dog is grabbing your body by the collar, trying to drag it back into the pod, to little avail. In a stroke of luck for him, your body goes in to sniff Shep's butt, and he's able to heave him into the pod and close the door.

You stand near the other pod, and Shep growls at you.

"Shep, I'm sorry you got used to being a person, but I have to put everyone back to normal. This isn't right"

The dog, now with a wonderful understanding of human speech stops, and looks down at his feet. He seems to think for a moment, and then he comes at you!

Shep grabs you by the shirt again, and yanks you forward, pushing you into the pod. Despite this, he looks completely miserable.

"Thank you," you say as you hit the button. There's a blue light that overtakes you, heats up your entire body until you feel completely numb. Your vision fades, and then, you're back.

You wake up feeling sore, and move to stretch your legs. They knock against the walls of the pod. You're huge! You're back! You're... wet in the crotch. Marky wet himself while he was in your body. He hadn't been doing well with potty training, so it's not surprising, but you're just so happy to be back.

15121111112221112.content:
You climb out of the pod to see a toddler harassing Shep. Finally, everyone is back in their own bodies. All of us, back in our own, disgusting bodies. You go over to Shep, and pat him on the head, which causes him to growl. Something tells you he doesn't like being treated like a dog.

"Thank you Shep. I know it must be so hard to go back to being a dog after all this time, but this is how things are supposed to be. We couldn't just let my brother stay a dog forever." You look over at your little brother, and see him behaving like a dog in a human body. This was his first time having human limbs that could actually work like legs and arms, and it wasn't really working for him. He tried standing and failed. Words wouldn't come out correctly. You could already smell feces. You're suddenly glad your parents insisted on keeping you in pull-ups even though you'd mastered the potty pretty quickly.

Marky had missed out on a year of development that would be really hard to get back, especially because the family thought he'd already gone through all those stages. Somehow, you feel very sad to see this... this... baby. Quite literally shitting over everything you've done.

And then you get an idea.
15121111112221112.title: Back to normal

151211111122211121.content:
You pick up Marky and put him in the pod, and then grab Shep and throw him in the other pod.

Marky comes out of the pod in Shep's body, tail wagging, and runs back out into the yard to play. You open the other pod and see a toddler staring at his hands in disbelief, before looking up at you and asking, "Why?"

"Marky has been a dog as long as he was ever a human. I can't ask him, but I think he's probably happier this way anyways, don't you think? And you... You're not a dog anymore. I would be sad if I never got to read anything you wrote ever again!"

"But, Kyle..." Shep struggles to speak a little. he's not adjusted to the growing vocal chords, even though you broke them in a lot.

"You skipped out on growing up as a human. It would probably do you a lot of good to get the real experience if you're going to be my little brother from now on. Don't worry. You'll be a teenager again before you know it."

Shep is overwhelmed by his emotions and begins to cry out, you pick him up and pat him on the back as you bring your baby brother back inside the house for a nap.
151211111122211121.title: Switch Marky with Shep

1512111111222111211.content:
After spending a year-long vacation in your little brother's body, it's a difficult transition back into your normal life.

"Normal," being relative. You underestimated how drastically Shep had changed your life while he was in your body. He'd burned bridges with your old friends, his talents were totally misaligned, and you just weren't capable of keeping up the relationships he'd started. You drifted away from them, and focused your time into trying to get into a good college. Your parents forced you to go to counseling after you had a second radical shift in personality. Life was always kind of... Empty from this point on. It became a theme that you felt like you were living someone else's life, especially whenever you opened your closet and saw Shep's fursuit hanging there. You still kept it, thinking Marky might want it again when he's older.

The Marky that used to be Shep. The Marky that became Shep ended up living happily as a dog into old age before passing on. You take the passing of the family dog harder than anyone else, feeling guilt for having put Markyr in the body of a dog, cutting his life dramatically shorter.

Marky, who was never called Shep ever again, grew up like an ordinary human child. The extra year of human experience let him take over from where you left off without raising too many suspicions, but in the end, his former-dog mind didn't seem to have the same barriers that you had, and over time, he seemed to forget about his time in your body, and maybe that he was ever a dog.

Marky, going by Mark now, grows up to be a very successful writer, while you never really amount to too much. Sometimes you wonder what might have been if you had left things as they were.
1512111111222111211.title: Epilogue

choices: Call him out for who he is
151211111122212.content:
You think about the former Marky, who is as happy as can be as a dog. You see no reason to take that away from him. At this point, coming back into his body, he'd go from a genius toddler to being potentially years behind in his development.

On the other hand, Shep, who you had come to fully accept as Kyle, had really turned your life into his own in a short time. He didn't have the same friends, his performance in school and his hobbies were totally different. While you accepted and understood his furry thing, you were certain the other kids at school probably weren't nearly as accepting. You didn't want to take on bullying for something that wasn't even you.

This life you'd started up for yourself was on a winning trajectory, and it seemed a little silly to bail on it now when you could start over and kill it.

As you're standing in the shed, philosophizing over where things had ended up, someone else entered the shed. It was Kyle!

"Marky? What are you doing out here?"

You think to yourself let’s see if this thing really works. You reach up and pull down the humming bird feeder and place it into the pod. After waiting for a while you realize this will never work since the pods are in the shed. Looking around the garage you see a huge pickle jar. You head back to the garden with the jar and the humming bird feeder, thinking to yourself this might actually work. After placing the feeder back on its stand, you begin looking at which flowers these little rascals seem to be attracted to. You gather up a few of the choicest flowers and place them in the jar. Then you place the jar besides the feeder and wait. After what seems an eternity, finally a hummingbird flies into the jar and you are able to get the lid on. The little bugger keeps hitting the sides of the jar and you are afraid it'll hurt itself. Quickly you take the jar back to the shed and open the jar in the pod. The hummingbird begins flying around the inside of the pod disorientated.
You run over to the next pod and hit the red button. As you hit the button you realize that it is hard to push, but it’s too late. There is a bright light. You feel yourself floating and as the light dims you feel yourself lying on the ground. You are disorientated. The door of the pod opens and above you is a giant version of Salem the neighbor cat. She pounces towards you. You instinctively fly for it and just miss getting smacked out of the air. You try to gain altitude but you are almost too slow for the cat. You weave in-between table legs trying to dodge this devil cat. You get some altitude and out of no where you see this giant cat flying at you with its mouth open and its paws stretched out. You turn hard right and fly up for all you are worth and you feel the cat’s paws graze your wing. You go tumbling out of control. Before you hit the ground you manage to straighten yourself out. The cat turns and jumps off the table at you. You steer toward the garbage can. You turn and fly straight up as Salem smacks straight into the can knocking it over. She recovers quickly as you head up towards the rafters. You loose sight of her. Its awful dark up here and you realize your hummingbird eyes don't see so well in the dark. Just then you see Teeth, eyeballs and claws flying at you up in the rafters. You drop into a nose dive. The cat over shoots you and lands on top of the pods. You realize you have to get the cat off the pods before it damages the wires. You buzz past the cat making yourself a target. You head straight for a bright light that appears to be a way out of the building. ITS GLASS....SHIT..... You hit the brakes just before smacking into the window. You turn around and see Salem getting to the kill position. The cat lets off a screech and jumps at you. You dodge left towards the door as the cat smacks into the glass. Salem lands behind you on the work bench as you fly as fast as you can. You are way to slow so you fly between tools and containers on the work bench. You can hear them clattering behind you as the cat races towards you. There is no way you’ll make it to the door so you dive over the edge and fly under the bench. The cat leaps off the counter. She has lost track of you. This buys you the time you need, so you make a v-line for the door.

Once outside you realize you are starving. You head towards the bird feeder and the takes some sips. It tastes better then anything you have ever tried before. When you become human you might have to try this stuff. You head over to flowers and begin feeding. Then another hummingbird begins chasing you. You can't figure out what its problem is. Then you realize you are in its territory. It won't stop chasing you. You think to yourself, 'I just almost got eaten by a cat and now this.' You fly low over the little pond your dad dug in the garden as the other hummingbird takes another dive at you. You darted left and right hoping to avoid him. You see a bullfrog. You don't think anything of this until like in slow motion you see its tongue flying out at you. You climb and close your eyes. When you open them you see little feathers sticking out of the frog’s mouth. He had just snapped up your rival. You head back to the flowers and the feeder to get something more to eat and calm your nerves. As you fly back towards the feeder you realize how beautiful mom’s garden is. It’s like you have never really seen it until now. As you eat you think what you should do next.

"Alright sweetie," your mother says as she seats you down in the pod, "are you ready?" You stare up from the pod seat at the body your mother currently inhabitated.

"I'm not sure, mom." you say nervously.

"Well don't be," she assured you, "this is a once in a lifetime opportunity." she said smiling. The zoo director appeared at the doorway of the pod.

"Alright kid, we've got an animal ready for you to switch with." he explained.

"And what is it?" you asked eagerly. He chuckled.

"That's a surpise." he said as your mom got out of the pod, the doors shut, leaving you in the dark. A few minutes later, a bright flash fills the pod and you feel yourself go faint.

Nothing felt right when you awoke. You felt huge, and heavy. Your eyes slowly opened, finding the director and your mother standing in front of you, a large pink and grey mass between them and your sight. You attempted to stand, but it was a struggle. The director walked up and patted your side.

"Can you hear us kid?" he asked, you slowly open your mouth, a large bellowing erupting out. He chuckled.

"Guess that's a yes. You're probably wondering what you are right now." you tried nodding your head, "Well take a look to your right and see for yourself. You slowly turned your large head.

And saw a hippo stare back at you.

"Say hello to Harriet." the director said confidently, "Cause that'll be your name and face for the next two weeks."

'two weeks?!' you thought panicked.

Your mother slowly rubbed your large snout.

"Isn't this amazing sweetheart?" she asked.

Finally at Amy's house, Katherine unlocks the door and let's herself in. Seeing that she and Amy are close you imagine she barges into Amy's house frequently.

"I'm home!" She yells making her presence known throughout the house.

15523111.content:
A few blocks away from your house, the police are investigating the most recent murder from a serial killer. One of the police officers, George Hails, said, "I hope we find this sick bastard, and soon. This is the fourth one dead, we can't let this continue."

Another officer, Michael Mayers, replied, "I agree, but first we have to find out who the killer is. I hope the dogs will be able to pick up a scent this time."

As the two officers spoke, three police dogs (all German Shepherds) were sniffing the ground, memorizing the scents. One of them picked her head up and barked at the back door. George frowned, "What the hell? Do you think the dogs found something?"

Michael shrugged, before both officers took out their guns and walked to where they heard the barking. Seeing that the dog was barking at the back door, they prepared themselves in case the killer was on the other side of the door.

Slowly, they opened the door. But nobody was outside. George frowned, "What the-" George then realized he stepped on something: a doggy toy shaped like a cat, belonging to the previous occupant and his dog.

The officers put their guns away. George said, "Damn, I guess they just saw-"

George never got to finish his sentence, because the killer slit his throat, before stabbing Michael. Michael screamed in agony, but before the killer could finish his/her work, the dog that barked jumped on him/her, with the other dogs following this one.

Unfortunately for the canine, the killer punched her in the face and kicked the other two away before they could bite. The killer took off and started running towards your house, leaving behind the wounded police officer, allowing him to call for backup.

A few minutes later, you walked into the garage thinking, 'I wonder when the vixen will show up.'

Before you could make a decision, the killer ran into your open garage and stopped for a breathe. You, of course, were shocked at the strange figure dressed in a dark camouflage outfit that covered the individual from head to toe with blood splatters on the outfit.

The killer notices you, and takes out the knife he/she used to kill George. Right before he/she could kill you, the dog caught up. The killer kicked the dog into one of the pods before returning his/her attention back to you. Upon hearing advancing police sirens, and the other two dogs barking, the killer decided to knock you into the other pod and hope the police will help you, rather than catch him/her.

info.brief_description: You win a body switching machine in a contest. When other people find it what will happen?
info.description:
You win a body switching machine in a contest from the Ye olde Body Shope. Wierd thing is, you never entered. Try to keep the main characters in the same personality, don't randomly change them.

______________________________________


This interactive has been going strong for five years, thanks to everyone who has contributed to it since its creation. While I wouldn't claim this story is stale, it's jam-packed, and it can be tough to bring new angles in at a reasonable point. I'm working on another body swap machine interactive, which I'm very excited about. If you've enjoyed Body Switching Machine, I'd love if you would consider adding to "New Body Switching Machine"
